sentence: Democratic activist Stacey Abrams, known for her get-out-the-vote activism, is running again for governor of Georgia after narrowly losing to the current governor, Brian Kemp, in 2018.
author: Art Moore
title: '2000 Mules' investigator: Georgia officials intimidating my witnesses

sentence: Former President Donald Trump's "Save America" political action committee (PAC) on Tuesday sent an email to subscribers that linked to an article that claims Governor Brian Kemp's victory in last week's Republican gubernatorial primary was the result of voter fraud.
author: Jon Jackson
title: Trump Pushes Claim That Brian Kemp's 50-Point Victory Was Fraud

sentence: RELATED: Georgia GOP outraged Trump turned against Brian Kemp: 'I am just so mad beyond words" There is no evidence that Georgia's gubernatorial primary was impacted by fraud.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: Trump continues to cry "obvious fraud" in Georgia  even after losing candidates he endorsed concede

author: Jon Skolnik
title: Trump continues to cry 'obvious fraud' in Georgia  even after losing candidates he endorsed concede
